title: Learn Quantum Computing Online | Free Tutorials & Interactive Exercises | IQM Academy - Learn Quantum Computing
text: Learn the foundations of quantum computing Follow our curriculum and learn how a quantum computer works and how to work with a quantum computer. Foundations of Quantum Computing Learn more about quantum computing in this interactive learning experience Prerequisites Topics Quantum Computing Applications Learn more about quantum computing in this interactive learning experience Prerequisites Topics Quantum Algorithms Learn more the basics of quantum algorithms in this interactive learning experience Prerequisites Topics Level up your quantum computing skills After you picked up the foundations of quantum computing, explore these modules to advancing your quantum computing skills. Learn how to use code to express your quantum computing ideas and utilize an IQM Quantum Computer. Get started with Qrisp on IQM Learn how to get started with Qrisp on IQM's quantum computers Prerequisites Topics Creating Quantum Circuits With Code Use code to express your quantum computing ideas Prerequisites Topics Implementing Textbook Algorithms Bernstein-Vazirani and Grover's algorithm Prerequisites Topics Dive deeper into quantum computing You are really into quantum computing and want to continue your learning path with more advanced quantum computing modules? We got you covered. These modules require some basic understanding of quantum computing notation, but are still easy to pick up. Identifying Errors on a Quantum Computer Finding errors on a quantum computer Prerequisites Topics Quantum Error Correction Correcting errors on a quantum computer Prerequisites Topics
